title: Scott Robb went from serious illness to gifted golfer
text:
Published By: Denver Post Preps - Today 
As Halloween nears, so does the resurrection of dark memories for Scott Robb. He nearly died six years ago on Halloween. "I haven't been the... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
